overview: It's the final weeks of the school year and the oversexed seniors of Smash Academy are literally creaming their panties itching to get their holes plugged with stiff dicks. Decked out in mandatory school uniforms these little vixens fuck every man in sight from the father of their best friend, the school bus driver, other students, and even the director of the academy. No cock is left undrained. Eighteen and restless, all the rules are broken on this school bus ride.
tagline: Don't be late for the bus!! Especially the one carrying these sluts to school!
title: Bus Stop Girls 2
